error.message: Call to deprecated method getImplementations() of class Drupal\Core\Extension\ModuleHandlerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Instead you should use ModuleHandlerInterface::invokeAllWith() for hook invocations or you should use ModuleHandlerInterface::hasImplementations() to determine if hooks implementations exist.
Call to deprecated function _drupal_schema_initialize(). Deprecated in drupal:9.2.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. No direct replacement is provided.

Class Drupal\schema\SchemaDatabaseSchema_mysql extends deprecated class Drupal\Core\Database\Driver\mysql\Schema. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The MySQL database driver has been moved to the mysql module.

Call to method createTableSql() of deprecated class Drupal\mysql\Driver\Database\mysql\Schema. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The MySQL database driver has been moved to the mysql module.

Call to method getFieldTypeMap() of deprecated class Drupal\mysql\Driver\Database\mysql\Schema. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The MySQL database driver has been moved to the mysql module.

Fetching class constant COMMENT_MAX_COLUMN of deprecated class Drupal\Core\Database\Driver\mysql\Schema. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The MySQL database driver has been moved to the mysql module.

Fetching class constant COMMENT_MAX_TABLE of deprecated class Drupal\Core\Database\Driver\mysql\Schema. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The MySQL database driver has been moved to the mysql module.

Class Drupal\schema\SchemaDatabaseSchema_pgsql extends deprecated class Drupal\Core\Database\Driver\pgsql\Schema. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The PostgreSQL database driver has been moved to the pgsql module.

Call to method createTableSql() of deprecated class Drupal\pgsql\Driver\Database\pgsql\Schema. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The PostgreSQL database driver has been moved to the pgsql module.

Call to method getFieldTypeMap() of deprecated class Drupal\pgsql\Driver\Database\pgsql\Schema. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The PostgreSQL database driver has been moved to the pgsql module.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
